name: locations_auto_complete_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool the_fork_the_spoon.
Tool description: This API helps to query the best restaurant and meal around the world to create a traveling site/application such as thefork.com
API description: Fetch location suggestions based on a term or phrase, with optional location-based sorting.

text.description: The term or phrase to search for location suggestions (e.g., city, district, country name).

latitude.description: The latitude of the end user's location, used for sorting purposes. Defaults to None.

longitude.description: The longitude of the end user's location, used for sorting purposes. Defaults to None.
